Articles.Content:
I rip the flag off with my teeth.

My hill.

I put a new flag on. 

My hill.

I shut down the flag store in the past. Your flags vanish out of existence.

My hill.

I time travel back to the 1700s and claim the hill in the name of me.

My hill

I travel back into 2000 B.C/B.C.E, and plant my flag on the hill.

My hill.

i travel back to the big bang and claim the hill for me

my hill in the primordial universe

I travel to Boris, a planet of Kirius B, and make a hill.

My hill.

I buy a death star, blow up Boris and all of Kirius B, destroying you and your hill. I then relocate back to the original hill where I stick my graphene buckyball flag on it, then I surround my newly claimed hill with a moat and a wall made up of the very finest stone from Kason.

My Hill.

i use a hadron collider and make a black hole which destroy your death star, you and the original hill.

i make a hill on duna.

my hill.
I take a little bit off duna, causing the atmosphere to release and you suffocaste. my spacesute and me's hill.

I get danny's planet buster, destroy duna and create a hill inside my spaceship on its way out of the kerbol system.

my hill.

> 
> I take a little bit off duna, causing the atmosphere to release and you suffocaste. my spacesute and me's hill.

i use danny's planet buster and destroy duna, and build a hill inside my spacecraft which is about to leave the kerbol system.

my hill.

(try deleting the first dupe post, kwerbal)

The duna hill disassembles itself because it's in shpace.

My dust cloud.

I clump the dustcloud onto ike.(wich destroys all craft)

my hill.

I nuke Ike and move dust to bop 

my hill

I delete the dust config and make my hill of ike's astroid remains.

(the hill was made of dust)

my astroid hill

i get NASA to come to the kerbal solar system with an ARM spacecraft that moves the asteriod to a different orbit, meanwhile it brushes your stuff and you off of it.

my redirected asteriod hill
Space x captures the asteroid my hill

Battleship lands on top of hill. 

My Hillship.
M land sub attacks your battle ship my hill
my nuke explodes all of your guy's stuff. my crater

My drone stalls the dust cloud from the nuke 

my hill

My electronic Kraken disables your drones.

My hill.
Helix kills your kraken my hill
Science invalidates Helix, my hill.
